page.title: 12PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The{Parish Council}was formed in{1895} and held its first meeting in{1896.} There are twelve members and the Chairman is Major Barclay.They meet once a month and the Parish meeting is held in April.{Elections}are held every 3 years. There are 1100 people on the{Electoral}Roll. Mr.Kaye is the Parish Clerk and treasurer. The precept comes from the free 2p.They are responsible for the graveyard, the playing field and its facitities, the village hall, footpaths, roads and planning. They give grants and loans to local associations, and pay a groundsman to look after the playing field. They also pay for electricity and water rates for the facilities on the playing field.
